The goal of the experiment is to decrease number of unsold items on <http://gsaauctions.gov>.

```{r}
library(data.table)
load("Data/wrkdat.rda")
```

How many bids were there in the `r nrow(wrkdat)` emails?

```{r}
sum(!is.na(wrkdat$BID.AMT))
```
